GV06keskaupu:2974: retodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi vayodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi yūthatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi gaṇatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi sahasrapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmyaparimitapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmi ||
GV06keskaupu:2976: etaṃ vo yuvānam (9.4.24) iti purāṇaṃ pravṛtya navamutsṛjate samprokṣati || KauśS_3,7{24}.21 ||]
GV06keskaupu:2977: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya kukṣiḥ' ityṛcā ṛṣabhaṃ sampātya vivāhavat agnipariṇayanaṃ kṛtvā saha vatsatarībhirvisarjayati |
GV06keskaupu:2982: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sāhasraḥ' ityarthasūktena vṛṣabhaṃ sampātya vivāhavat sarvaṃ kṛtvā visarjayati |
GV06keskaupu:2986: yadā ekādaśāhe vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti tadā śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tato vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:2993: 'sāhasraḥ' ityarthasūktena śvetena ṛṣabheṇendraṃ yajate vaśāvidhānena | sampatkāmaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:2996: rātrau abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā trayaścaravaḥ śrapayitavyāḥ 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākena ||
GV06keskaupu:2998: paścādagnerdarbheṣu khadāyāṃ bhūmāvekaṃ caruṃ sakṛt sarvahutaṃ juhoti ||
GV06keskaupu:3001: [tṛtīyasyāditaḥ saptabhiḥ bhūme mātaḥ (12.1.63) iti trirjuhoti || KauśS_3,7{24}.27 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3002: tṛtīyaṃ caruṃ 'satyaṃ bṛhad' (12.1.1-7) iti sapta 'bhūme mātaḥ' ityṛcā juhoti | trirmantrāvṛttiḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3011: iti navabhiḥ 'śantivā' iti daśamyā, 'udāyuṣā' iti dvābhyām ||
GV06keskaupu:3013: [udīrāṇāḥ (7.1.28) iti trīṇi padāni prāṅvodaṅvā bāhyenopaniṣkramya yāvatte (12.1.33) iti vīkṣate ||
GV06keskaupu:3024: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākenodapātraṃ sampātya purastādagneḥ sīraṃ yuktaṃ samprokṣati |
GV06keskaupu:3027: 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākena kṛṣikarma | 'sīrā yuñjanti' vat karma bhavati ||
GV06keskaupu:3028: [yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne (12.1.38-40) iti juhoti varo ma āgamiṣyati iti || KauśS_3,7{24}.37 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3029: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne' iti tisṛbhirājyaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3040: vṛṣṭikāle 'yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam' ityṛcā navodakamabhimantryācamanaṃ karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3041: 'yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam' ityṛcā navodakamabhimantrya snānaṃ karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3043: [yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ (13.1.21-24) iti dyauḥ pṛṣatyādityo rohitaḥ || KauśS_3,7{24}.42 ||
GV06keskaupu:3045: 'yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ' iti caturbhiḥ raktavarṇāṃ gāmabhimantrya brāhmaṇāya dadāti puṣṭikāmaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3047: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathaḥ' iti caturbhiḥ raktavarṇāyāḥ goḥ kṣīraudanaṃ śrapayitvā sarvahutaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3084: 'yaṃ tvā pṛṣatīḥ' (KauśS 24.42) ityete mantrāḥ puṣṭikarmamadhye paṭhitāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3086: pauṣṭikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ havirupadhānam upasthānaṃ vā karoti vikalpena puṣṭikarmaṇāmupadhānopasthānam (KauśS 24.45) iti vacanāt |
GV06keskaupu:3087: puṣṭikarmaṇām upadhānam upasthānaṃ vā karoti puṣṭikāmaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3088: upadadhītetyanādeśe ājyaṃ samitpuroḍāśapayaodanapāyasapaśuvrīhiyavatilāḥ dhānāḥ karambhaśaṣkulyaḥ etāni havīṃṣi jānīyāt |
GV06keskaupu:3089: yatra yatra homaḥ kartavyastatra tatra sarvatropadhānaṃ pauṣṭikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ kartavyam |
GV06keskaupu:3091: gṛhe bahirvā vṛkṣārthaṃ puruṣārthaṃ paśvarthaṃ hastyartham aśvārthaṃ goarthaṃ mahiṣyartham ajāvikādigṛhapaśudhanadhānyamṛgārtham |
GV06keskaupu:3095: yatrānyaprayojanārthaṃ homaḥ na tatra pauṣṭikahomaḥ kāryaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3119: asya gaṇasya vā upadhānaṃ ājyādi vā karoti athavā upasthānam |
GV06keskaupu:3137: tatra āhāranimitteṣu carakabāhaḍasuśrutapraṇīteṣu auṣadheṣu vyādhyupaśamanaṃ bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:3147: iti sūktena udapātraṃ sampātya vyādhitasya śarīraṃ sammārṣṭi |
GV06keskaupu:3151: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya mukhavalīrvimārṣṭyaṅgavalīśca |
GV06keskaupu:3156: [vidmā śarasya (1.2) ado yad (2.3) iti muñjaśiro rajjvā badhnāti || KauśS_4,1{25}.6 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3157: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti sūktena muñjapuṣpamaṇiṃ muñjarajjvā baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3160: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'ado yadavadhāvati' iti sūktena muñjaśiro rajjvā baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3175: 'ado yad' iti sūktena ghṛtamabhimantryāpānaṃ vā pralimpati | atisāre ca ||
GV06keskaupu:3179: 'ado yad' iti sūktena mukhena khalvā vābhimantryāpānaṃ śiśnaṃ vā nāḍīṃ vā vraṇamukhaṃ dhamati |
GV06keskaupu:3180: samāptāni jvarātisāra atimūtra aṅganāḍīpravāhe ca bhaiṣajyāni ||
GV06keskaupu:3183: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena harītakīṃ karpuraṃ vā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3188: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena tallagnaṃ laṇḍikātṛṇamabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3191: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena jaradindukamabhimantrya piṣṭvā pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3193: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena sūktena kāṣṭhatakṣaṇānyudake kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3200: 'viṣitaṃ te vastibilam' iti dvābhyāṃ dadhimathitoparyupaveśya tato'bhimantrayate |
GV06keskaupu:3201_0: 'viṣitaṃ te vastibilam' iti dvābhyāṃ jaratpramandasyoparyupaveśyābhimantrayate mūtrapratibandhe.'viṣitaṃ
GV06keskaupu:3201_1: te vastibilam' ityṛgbhyāṃ dārutakṣaśakalānāmuparyupaveśya vyādhitamabhimantrayate mūtrapratibandhe |
GV06keskaupu:3204: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena hastyādiyānaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tato vyādhitamārohayati |
GV06keskaupu:3207: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena dhanuḥśaramabhimantrya tato vyādhitaṃ prati śaraṃ kṣipati śīghraḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3209: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena śiśnamabhimantrya carma niḥsphoṭati |
GV06keskaupu:3212: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena lohaśalākāmabhimantrya śiśnaṃ praveśayati |
GV06keskaupu:3214: [ekaviṃśatiṃ yavān dohanyāmadbhirānīya drughnīṃ jaghane saṃstabhya phalato'vasiñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:3216: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena drughnīṃ jyādhanuṣaṃ jaghane śiśnadeśa ūrdhvaṃ kṛtvā godohanyāmudakaṃ kṛtvā yavānekaviṃśatiṃ prakṣipya tenodakena dhanuṣa upari phalaṃ siñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3220: 'vidmā śarasya' iti dvitīyena yavagodhūmavallī padmamūlaṃ pāṭhikā etāni kvāthayitvābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3221: samāptāni mūtrapratibandhe duḥkhamūtrakaraṇe duḥkhapurīṣakaraṇa udāvartana udarapūrṇanirodhakaraṇe caitāni bhaiṣajyāni kāryāṇi | ārogyakāmaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3223: [ambayo yanti (1.4) vāyoḥ pūtaḥ (6.51) iti ca śāntāḥ || KauśS_4,1{25}.20 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3224: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ambayo yanti' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3229: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti sūktena tṛcenājyaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3234: 'vāyoḥ pūtaḥ' iti tṛcena pālāśādyāḥ samidhaḥ somarasenāktā ādadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3235: somavamane somapāne somābhiṣave ca vyādhyutpanne bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:3238: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kukusāñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3244: gṛhe grāme vā pattane kṣetre vā devagṛhe vā yatra kvacit piśācaśaṅkāsti tatra homaṃ kṛtvā dhūmaṃ niyataṃ kuryādityarthaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3283: yasmin sthāne piśācastasmin sthāne homaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:3284: yathā dhūmo bhavati tathā kuryāt sthāne ca |
GV06keskaupu:3287: 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena busaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3305: puruṣasya sthāne nagare grāme gṛhe vā yatra śaṅkā vidyate tatra dhūmakaraṇaṃ homena.
GV06keskaupu:3314: yadi grāme nagare vā rathyāyāṃ vā kṣetre vā tadā japaṃ kṛtvā piśācanāmagrahaṇaṃ kuryāditi |
GV06keskaupu:3359: 'tāntsatyaujāḥ', 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ khadirasamidha ādadhāti | tantravikalpaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:3365: ekaṃ kuryāt dve vā bahūni vā.
GV06keskaupu:3369: 'śanno devīḥ' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidha ādadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3370: 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghīḥ samidha ādadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3377: [ayugmānkhādirāñchaṅkūn akṣyau ni vidhya (5.29.4) iti paścādagneḥ samambhūmi nihanti ||
GV06keskaupu:3379: 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ khadiraśaṅkūn sapta nava vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3385: 'niḥsālam' iti sūktena sapta khadiraśaṅkūnabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā |
GV06keskaupu:3387: 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ sapta khadirakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau nividhya' ityṛcā paścādagnernikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3389: 'śanno devīḥ' iti sūktena ayugmān khādirāñchaṅkūnabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā paścādagnernikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3390: 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena sapta kīlakānabhimantrya paścādagneḥ 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3393: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ sapta kīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā nikhanati agneḥ paścāt |
GV06keskaupu:3395: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena khādiramayān sapta kīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti ṛcā | piśācabhaye ||
GV06keskaupu:3398: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ lohakīlakān pañca sapta vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā |
GV06keskaupu:3400: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena lohakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti |
GV06keskaupu:3407: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ pañca sapta vā lohamayakīlakānabhimantrya nikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya'
GV06keskaupu:3409: 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena lohamayakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā |
GV06keskaupu:3410: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena lohamayakīlakān pañca sapta vābhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' ityṛcā |
GV06keskaupu:3413: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ tāmramayakīlakānabhimantrya paścādagnernikhanati 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti |
GV06keskaupu:3417: 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena tāmramayān kīlakānabhimantrya nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3419: 'tāntsatyaujāḥ' iti sūktena tāmrakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti paścādagnernikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3420: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena tāmramayakīlakānabhimantrya 'akṣyau ni vidhya' iti nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:3429: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanaṃ vāntarāṇi vā gṛhaṃ vā grāmaṃ vā eṣu sthāneṣu parikiret rakṣobhaye |
GV06keskaupu:3430: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya gṛhādiṣu parikirati piśācabhaye |
GV06keskaupu:3431: 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:3433: 'śanno devī' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:3436: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye |
GV06keskaupu:3437: 'purastādyukto vaha' iti sūktena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye |
GV06keskaupu:3438: 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena taptaśarkarā abhimantrya śayanarāśipalyāni parikirati piśācabhaye ||
GV06keskaupu:3441: ya āgacchet taṃ brūyāt śaṇaśulbena jihvāṃ nirmṛjānaḥ śālāyāḥ praskanda iti || KauśS_4,1{25}.28 ||
GV06keskaupu:3447: etasmin tantre yavarāśimadhyānmuṣṭimekāṃ gṛhātvolūkhalena khaṇḍyata apradakṣiṇaṃ piṣyate |
GV06keskaupu:3448: tato vyādhitaṃ sampātya śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato grahaṇamuktaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3449: yadi na karoti śaṇena jihvāmārjanaṃ tadā na gato graha iti vijānīyāt |
GV06keskaupu:3450: amāvāsyāyāmājyatantraṃ śarastṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmamupasamāhitamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3453: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tadā gato grahaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3454: amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3456: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato gato grahaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3457: amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ yavānapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3459: yadi śaṇasūtreṇa jihvāmārjanaṃ karoti tato gato grahaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3460: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātarabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3463: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3465: śaṇena jihvāmārjanam.amāvāsyāyāṃ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭaṃ tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tāntsatyaujāḥ',
GV06keskaupu:3466: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhotiṭata uttaratantram |
GV06keskaupu:3468: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3471: amāvāsyāyāṃ prātaḥ śaramayaṃ barhiḥstṛtaṃ sarṣapedhmaviśiṣṭamabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākena sakṛdgṛhītān yavānanapahatānapratīhāraṃ piṣṭān saktūñjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3474: yadi na karoti tadā na gato grahaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3482: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ pūrṇapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3486: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhiḥ vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ palāśapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3488: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'śanno devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3491: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3494: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3497: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktena vīriṇatūlamiśritamiṅgiḍaṃ parṇapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3501: athāsmin gṛhe piśāco'sti vā na veti saṃśaye idaṃ karma ucyate -
GV06keskaupu:3506: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ sarṣapedhmaṃ śaramayaṃ barhirabhimantrya śālāyā upari nidadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3512: 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena tārṣṭāghedhmaṃ śaramayaṃ barhiścābhimantrya śālāyā upari nidadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3527: tata idhmābarhiḥ śālāyā gṛhītvā tena tantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3536: tantraṃ kṛtvā tenānuvākena vīriṇatūlamiśramiṅgiḍaṃ prapuṭena juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3540: 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya tamācāmayati samprokṣati ca |
GV06keskaupu:3541: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam |
GV06keskaupu:3543: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'arāyakṣayaṇam' iti tisṛbhirudakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca piśācagṛhītaṃ puruṣam |
GV06keskaupu:3544: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'śanno devī' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca |
GV06keskaupu:3546: vaiśravaṇāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitaṃ mānuṣam |
GV06keskaupu:3548: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya vyādhitamācāmayati samprokṣati ca |
GV06keskaupu:3550: vaiśravaṇāyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā 'purastādyuktaḥ' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitamācāmayati samprokṣati ca |
GV06keskaupu:3552: vaiśravaṇāyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā 'rakṣohaṇam' ityanuvākenodakamabhimantryācāmayati samprokṣati ca vyādhitam |
GV06keskaupu:3560: rātrau 'stuvānam', 'idaṃ haviḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ ulmuke dve abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati |
GV06keskaupu:3564: rātrau 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena ulmuke abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati |
GV06keskaupu:3565: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena dakṣiṇena prakrāmati |
GV06keskaupu:3568: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena padāni prakrāmati |
GV06keskaupu:3569: rātrau 'śanno devī' ityulmuke abhimantrya parasparaṃ ghṛṣyati |
GV06keskaupu:3571: rātrau 'ā paśyati' ityulmukadvayaṃ parasparaṃ sarvatrābhimantraṇānte saṅghṛṣyati |
GV06keskaupu:3572: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati |
GV06keskaupu:3573: rātrau 'tāntsatyaujāḥ' 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktābhyāmulmuke abhimantrya saṅghṛṣyati |
GV06keskaupu:3574: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktena padāni dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:3577: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati |
GV06keskaupu:3582: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā padāni prakrāmati |
GV06keskaupu:3585: ye'nye'pi kṣudrabrāhmaṇajātikāḥ kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādayo grahāḥ sarve ebhiḥ karmabhistuṣyanti |
GV06keskaupu:3590: 'ayaṃ devānām' iti sūktena ghaṭe darbhapiñjulīḥ prakṣipyekaviṃśatigṛhatṛṇāni ca prakṣipya taṃ ghaṭamabhimantrya tato vyādhitaṃ siñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3599: [jarāyujaḥ (1.12) iti medo madhu sarpistailaṃ pāyayati || KauśS_4,2{26}.1 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3606: [mauñjapraśnena śirasyapihitaḥ savyena titauni pūlyāni dhārayamāṇo dakṣiṇenāvakiran vrajati ||
GV06keskaupu:3608: vyādhitaśiro mauñjaveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā vāmena hastena pavanaṃ lājasahitaṃ gṛhītvā |
GV06keskaupu:3609: dakṣiṇena hastena tān lājān pragṛhya 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena lājān prakiran vrajati vyādhideśaṃ yāvat |
GV06keskaupu:3613: vāmena hastena pavanaṃ mauñjendukaṃ ca gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena hastena jyāṃ drughnīṃ gṛhītvā vyādhitamagre kṛtvā ||
GV06keskaupu:3615: yatra vyādhirutpannastatra sthāne gatvā 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā mauñjapraśnaṃ pavanaṃ ca prakṣipati vyādhitaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3620: vātajvare kaṭibhaṅge śirīroge ca vātagulme vātavikāre ca sarvaroge dhanurvāte'ṅgakampane vāte śarīrabhaṅge sarvavātavikāre bhaiṣajyam |
GV06keskaupu:3624: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena pañcaparvaveṇudaṇḍaṃ lalāṭe saṃstabhya japati |
GV06keskaupu:3625: śiroroge kaṭibhaṅge vā vātagulme vā vātavikāre ca |
GV06keskaupu:3627: atha lohite vahati śarīramadhye bahiśca śastraghāte pāṣāṇalakuṭeṣṭakādyabhighāte karmāṇyucyante -
GV06keskaupu:3629: pañcaparvaveṇudaṇḍaṃ rudhiravahanasthāne dattvā 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktaṃ japati |
GV06keskaupu:3631: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena rathyāyāḥ pāṃsūn gṛhītvābhimantrya rudhiravraṇe vikirati |
GV06keskaupu:3632: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena sikatā abhimantrya vyādhideśe kirati ||
GV06keskaupu:3634: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktenārmakapālikāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3641: 'amūryāḥ' iti sūktena catvāri dūrvāgrāṇi piṣṭvā taiḥ saha dadhipalalamāṃsādyāloḍya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3642: rudhirapravāhe śarīramadhye śastrādyabhighāte bahiśca śoṇitavahane gudavahane mukhavahane nāsikārudhiravahane śiro'ṅgulyādirudhirapravāhe ca |
GV06keskaupu:3646: 'anu sūryam' iti raktavṛṣabharomamiśramudakamabhimantrya pāyayati | kāmale hṛdroge ca bhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:3648: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena raktavṛṣabhapṛṣṭha udakamānīya tato'bhimantryācāmayati ||
GV06keskaupu:3650: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena go raktacarmachidramaṇiṃ godugdhe dattvā taṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti ||
GV06keskaupu:3652: dugdhaṃ ca pāyayati | abhyātānādyuttaratantram | kāmale hṛdroge ca liṅgyupatāpaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3653: [haridraudanabhuktamucchiṣṭānucchiṣṭenā prapadāt pralipya mantroktānadhastalpe haritasūtreṇa savyajaṅghāsu baddhvā'vasnāpayati ||
GV06keskaupu:3655: haridraudanaṃ vyādhitasya bhojanaṃ dattvā tasyocchiṣṭaṃ cānucchiṣṭaṃ caikatra kṛtvā tena codvartanaṃ kṛtvā śiraḥprabhṛtyārabhya yāvatpādau |
GV06keskaupu:3656: tato vyādhitaṃ ca khaṭvāyāmupaveśya khaṭvāyā adhastāt |
GV06keskaupu:3657: śukaḥ kāṣṭhaśuko gopītilakā caite trayaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3658: savyajaṅghāyāṃ haritasūtreṇa baddhvā khaṭvāyā adhastād badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3659: tato 'anu sūryam' iti sūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitaṃ snāpayati |
GV06keskaupu:3662: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena manthamabhimantrya prapādya prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:3663: sarvatra gṛhadvāre'gre vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā tamagre praveśya svayaṃ praviśya tato bhaktamabhimantrya tato vyādhitāya prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:3669: 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena gopītilakāṃ pakṣiṇīṃ yatra kutracid dṛṣṭvā vadantīṃ tatrābhimantrayed vyādhitaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3672: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'anu sūryam' iti sūktena vṛṣabhahṛdayalomabhirlākṣāraktaiḥ suvarṇaveṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitāya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3674: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ kuryād dve vā kuryāt sarvāṇi vā kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:3678: [naktañjātā (1.23) suparṇo jātaḥ (1.24) iti mantroktaṃ śakṛdā lohitaṃ praghṛṣyālimpati ||
GV06keskaupu:3681: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhṛṅgarājaharindrendravāruṇī nīlikāpuṣpā etāḥ pañca piṣṭvābhimantrya kuṣṭhaṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:3687: 'naktañjātā', 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ maruto yajate yathā varuṇaṃ pākayajñavidhānena |
GV06keskaupu:3689: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'naktañjātā', 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāṃ kṛṣṇāyā gorājyaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3692: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kāsadividhuvakavetasā oṣadhīrekatra kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya tata udakamadhye praveśyādhomukhaṃ pātraṃ ninayati |
GV06keskaupu:3695: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kāsādyoṣadhīrudake kṛtvā sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:3698: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ śvaśiro meṣaśiro mānuṣakeśarajjvā jaradupānahau ca vaṃśadvayāgre prabadhya yodhayati dhārayatītyarthaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3701: 'suparṇo jātaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ sūktābhyāmudakaṃ sampātya tenāmapātraṃ prasicya tato'śmānaṃ nidadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3702: tata āmapātramaśmānaṃ ca tripāde śikye nidadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3706: māruteṣu karmasu sarvatra mārutakṣīraudanaṃ mārutaśṛtaṃ mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutenājyeneti bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:3711: nityajvare velājvare satatajvare ekāntarajvare cāturthakajvare śītajvare caturjvare ca 'yadagniḥ' iti sūktena lohakuṭhāramabhimantryāgnau tāpayati |
GV06keskaupu:3712: tato 'yadagniḥ' iti japitvā taṃ kuṭhāramuṣṇodakamadhye kvāthayati |
GV06keskaupu:3713: tato 'yadagniḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā tenodakena vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3718: ityudvijamānasya śuklaprasūnasya vīriṇasya catasṛṇāmiṣīkāṇāmubhayataḥ pratyuṣṭaṃ badhnāti ||
GV06keskaupu:3720: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'upa prāgāt' iti sūktena śuklavīriṇeṣīkācatuṣṭayenobhayataḥ pratyuṣṭamekatra baddhvā maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti puṇyāhānte |
GV06keskaupu:3724: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'upa prāgāt' iti sūktena trividagdhaṃ śuklavīraṇakāṇḍamaṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3730: tataḥ prabhāte 'svastidāḥ' (1.21) iti sūktena dakṣiṇena pādena prakrāmati iti svastyayanam |
GV06keskaupu:3735: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'divyo gandharvaḥ' (2.1) iti sūktena ghṛtāktāḥ sarvauṣadhīrjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3738: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ me agne' (6.111) iti caturṛcenājyamiśrāḥ sarvauṣadhīrjuhoti |
GV06keskaupu:3743_0: catuṣpathe vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā tasya śirasi darbheṇḍukaṃ kṛtvā tasyopari kapālamagnipūrṇaṃ
GV06keskaupu:3743_1: prajvālitaṃ kṛtvā tatra prajvālite'gnau 'divyo gandharvaḥ' iti sūktena ghṛtāktāḥ
GV06keskaupu:3744: catuṣpathe ca śirasi darbheṇḍve'ṅgārakapāle prajvālite'gnau 'imaṃ me agne' iti
GV06keskaupu:3745: catasṛbhirājyenāktāḥ sarvauṣadhīrjuhoti pratyṛcaṃ śirasi home na tantram ||
GV06keskaupu:3747: vyādhitasya vallaṇikāṃ sarvauṣadhisahitāṃ haste kṛtvā nadyudakasammukhaṃ praveśya tato'vagāhayati |
GV06keskaupu:3748: 'davyo gndharvaḥ' iti sūktena sarvauṣadhīrudakamadhye vapati kartā |
GV06keskaupu:3749: 'divyo gandharvaḥ' iti sūktena paścāt sthito vyādhitaṃ siñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:3750: [āmapātra opyāsicya mauñje tripāde vayoniveśane prabadhnāti || KauśS_4,2{26}.32 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3751: tato mṛnmaya āmapātre homaśeṣaḥ sarvauṣadhīḥ kṛtvā pakṣiṇo yasmin vṛkṣe vasanti tatra tripāde śikye kṛtvā badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3753: 'imaṃ me agne' iti sūktena nadīmadhye vallaṇikāyāṃ sarvauṣadhīrghṛtāktā juhoti pratyṛcam |
GV06keskaupu:3754: tataḥ kartā tamavasiñcati vyādhitam 'imaṃ me' iti catasṛbhiḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3755: paścādāmapātra opyāsicya mauñje tripāde vayoniveśane vṛkṣe badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3756: rakṣograhe yakṣagrahe gandharvagrahe'psarograhe rājase grahe tāmase grahe grahabhaiṣajyāni samāptāni ||
GV06keskaupu:3757: atha laukike śāpe vaidike śāpe ca strīṇāmākrośe puruṣāṇāṃ ca bhaiṣajyamucyate -
GV06keskaupu:3772: sarvasmin saṃhitāvidhikarmaṇi pradhānakarmamadhye uttarataḥ udakumbhamāsthāpya tenodakena 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' (1.33)
GV06keskaupu:3776: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'aghadviṣṭā devajātā' iti sūktena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3778: laukika ākrośe vaidike ca brāhmaṇasya śāpe krūracakṣurdṛṣṭinipāte ca piśācarākṣasādiṣu bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:3780: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'śaṃ no devī pṛśniparṇī' iti sūktena pṛśniparṇīṃ sampātyābhimantrya ghṛṣṭvā punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitaṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:3782: pāpagṛhīte ca strīgarbhastrāve ca mṛtāpatyāyāṃ ca kravyādagṛhīte ca piśācagṛhīte ca rakṣomayabhaiṣajyam samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:3784: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'varaṇo vārayātā' iti tṛcena varaṇavṛkṣakāṣṭhamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3788: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'pippalī kṣiptabheṣajī' iti sūktena pippaladravyaṃ sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvāśayati |
GV06keskaupu:3791: vātavikāre dhanurvāte vātagulme vātaśūle kṣiptavātapradoṣe karmakṛte vāta utpanne sarvavātavikāre bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:3793: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vidradhasya balāsasya' iti tṛcena sūktena vyādhitasya mūrdhni sampātānānayati | abhimantraṇaṃ ca |
GV06keskaupu:3796: sarvavyādhivisarpaṇe hṛdayāmaye vā jalodare ca eteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:3797: 'vidradhasya' iti sūktena pālāśaśakalaṃ caturaṅgulamānaṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitaṃ limpati |
GV06keskaupu:3798: sarvavyādhivisarpaṇe prakope ca balāse cāntrādivisarpaṇe cākṣivisarpaṇe ca karṇavyādhivisarpaṇe hṛdayāmaye cājñātarājayakṣmaṇi ca |
GV06keskaupu:3800: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'yā babhravaḥ' iti sūktena daśavṛkṣaśakalāni lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya punaḥ sūktaṃ
GV06keskaupu:3804: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'udagātām' iti sūktena udakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ gṛhād bahiḥ kṛtvāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:3809: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'apeyaṃ rātrī' ityṛcā ghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya gṛhādbahirāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:3814: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjunakāṇḍasya' ityṛcārjunakāṣṭhaṃ yavabusaṃ tilapiñjikāṃ caikatra trīṇi baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3817: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjuna' ityṛcākṛtiloṣṭaṃ jīvakoṣaṇyāṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3819: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'babhrorarjuna' ityṛcā valmīkamṛttikāṃ carmajīvakoṣaṇyāṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3825: kaulaḥ kulabhavaḥ | sarvatra karmaṇāṃ vikalpaḥ || bhaiṣajyeṣu dvitīyā kaṇḍikā || KKp_26 ||
GV06keskaupu:3828: 'namaste lāṅgalebhyaḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭamabhimantrya vṛṣabhayuktasya halasyādhastāt kṛtvā vyādhitaṃ tato'bhiṣiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3836: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'namaḥ sanisrasākṣebhyaḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryottarasampātān jaradgartaḥ ānayati |
GV06keskaupu:3841: yatra yatra snānaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ ca tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyeṣu śiraḥprabhati mārjanaṃ kuryāt yāvat pādau |
GV06keskaupu:3845: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'daśavṛkṣa' iti sūktena vṛkṣavikalpena palāśādidaśavṛkṣaśakalāni gṛhītvā lākṣāhiraṇyena veṣṭitaṃ maṇiṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3849: daśa brāhmaṇā atharvāṅgirasaḥ suhṛdo 'daśavṛkṣa' iti sūktaṃ japanto vyādhitaśarīramabhimṛśanti |
GV06keskaupu:3852: [kṣetriyāttvā (2.10) iti catuṣpathe kāmpīlaśakalaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati ||
GV06keskaupu:3854: catuṣpathe gatvābhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'kṣetriyāttvā' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya kāmpīlaśakalāni vyādhitaparvaṇi dattvā
GV06keskaupu:3855: piñjūlīrghaṭe prakṣipya tato'bhiṣiñcati | tata ācamanam | uttaratantram | kṣetriyagrahe ||
GV06keskaupu:3857: 'kṣetriyāttvā' iti sūktenodakaghaṭaṃ saha piñjūlībhirabhimantrya catuṣpathe vyādhitaṃ kṛtvāvasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3863: prāṅmukhaṃ vyādhitaṃ pratyaṅmukhamavyādhitaṃ śākhāsūpaveśya vaitase camasa upamanthanībhyāṃ tṛṣṇāgṛhītasya śirasi manthamupamathyātṛṣitāya prayacchati ||
GV06keskaupu:3866: udita āditye prabhāte pṛṣṭhasaṃhitāvupaveśya dvau puruṣau |
GV06keskaupu:3867_0: prāṅmukhaṃ vyādhitaṃ pratyaṅmukhamavyādhitaṃ vaitasaśākhāsūpaveśya vaitase camase
GV06keskaupu:3867_1: saktūdakaṃ prakṣipya vaitasaśalākābhyāṃ manthaṃ nirmathya tṛṣṇāgṛhītasya śirasi manthamupamathya
GV06keskaupu:3867_2: 'pārthivasya' iti sūktena camasamabhimantrya tṛṣitāya prayacchati yasya vyādhirbhavati ||
GV06keskaupu:3875: [indrasya yā mahī (2.31) iti khalvaṅgānalāṇḍūn hananān ghṛtamiśrāñjuhoti || KauśS_4,3{27}.14 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3876: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena kṛṣṇacaṇakān ghṛtamiśrāñjuhoti | tantravikalpaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3877: [bālān kalmāṣe kāṇḍe savyaṃ pariveṣṭya sambhinatti || KauśS_4,3{27}.15 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3878: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena govālān | citrite śare savyaṃ pariveṣṭya pāṣāṇena cūrṇayati ||
GV06keskaupu:3884: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena savye haste pāṃsūn kṛtvā dakṣiṇena vimṛjya dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ sthitaḥ sūktaṃ japitvā vyādhitasyopari kirati |
GV06keskaupu:3887: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena pāṃsūn mardayati hastābhyāṃ vyādhitaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:3889: 'indrasya yā mahī' iti sūktena pālāśaudumbarādyāḥ samidha ādadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:3896: prātaḥ 'udyannādityaḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā gonāmoccārayitvā yasya krimayaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3897: 'te hatāḥ' iti mantreṇa darbhairāhanti krimīṇāṃ mukham ||
GV06keskaupu:3901: ādityasammukho'parāhṇe etat | trikāle karmasamāptiḥ | gonāmagrahaṇam 'asau' iti sthāne ||
GV06keskaupu:3911: 'udyannādityaḥ' iti sūktena pāṃsūnabhimantrya vāme haste kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ pāṃsunā kṛmivraṇaṃ mardayati |
GV06keskaupu:3917: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā vyādhitaṃ parvasu baddhvā 'akṣībhyāṃ te' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya tataḥ punaḥ sūktaṃ japitvāvasicya vyādhitasya parvagranthīn vimuñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3925: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena hariṇaśṛṅgamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:3928: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena hariṇaśṛṅgeṇa sahodakamabhimantrya pāyayatyācāmayati ca |
GV06keskaupu:3930: hariṇavarma śaṅkudhānaṃ prajvālyodake prakṣipya tato 'hariṇasya' ityabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3934: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena yavāñjuhoti pratyṛcaṃ rāśeraparimitān madhyāt sakṛd grāhyā yavā ityarthaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:3937: 'hariṇasya' iti sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya bhojane prapādya prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:3942: 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktena pūtigandhamatsyasahitamodanamabhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati bhakṣaṇārthaṃ bhojanakāle ||
GV06keskaupu:3944: 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktenāraṇyakatilaiḥ prajvālitamudakaṃ pātre prakṣipati |
GV06keskaupu:3954: uṣākāle 'muñcāmi tvā' iti sūktena cityādyābhiḥ prajvālitamudakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3969: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'muñca śīrṣaktyāḥ' ityṛcodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati vyādhitam |
GV06keskaupu:3976: [brāhmaṇo jajñe (4.6) iti takṣakāyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā japannācamayatyabhyukṣati || KauśS_4,4{28}.1 ||]
GV06keskaupu:3979: takṣakāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāmudakamabhimantrya samprokṣati viṣaduṣṭam |
GV06keskaupu:3982: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṛmukavṛkṣaśakalaṃ sahodakamabhimantrya tata ācāmayati |
GV06keskaupu:3989: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' iti sūktābhyāṃ jīrṇahariṇacarmāvajvālitamudake prakṣipya tamabhimantrya tato'vasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:3993: [sampātavatyudapātra ūrdhvaphalābhyāṃ digdhābhyāṃ manthamupamathya rayidhāraṇāpiṇḍānanvṛcaṃ prakīrya chardayate ||
GV06keskaupu:3995: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāmudapātraṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati viṣaduṣṭam |
GV06keskaupu:3997: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ viṣaliptābhyāṃ phalābhyāṃ saktumanthamupamathya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:3999: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ madanaphalāni pratyṛcamabhimantrya bhakṣayati |
GV06keskaupu:4003: 'brāhmaṇo jajñe' 'vāridam' iti sūktābhyāṃ haridrāṃ sarpiṣā sahitāmabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4012: 'rohaṇyasi' iti sūktena kṣīraṃ ghṛtamiśraṃ kṛtvā vyādhideśaṃ mrakṣati |
GV06keskaupu:4016: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā paśyati' iti sūktena sadampuṣpāmaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4019: brahmagrahe kṣatriyagrahe vaiśyagrahe śūdragrahe vānyeṣāṃ vyantarāṇāṃ piśācānāṃ rakṣasāṃ ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:4022: iti sapta kāmpīlapuṭānapāṃ pūrṇān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇenāvasicya paścādvidhyati ||
GV06keskaupu:4024: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhavāśarvau manve vām' iti sūktena saptarcenaikaikayarcā kāmpīlasaptapuṭakānudakapūrṇān sampātyarcarcā tataḥ pratyṛcamabhimantrya tato vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4030: [tvayā pūrvam (4.37) iti kośena śamīcūrṇāni bhakte || KauśS_4,4{28}.9 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4031: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīparṇacūrṇaṃ śamīphale kṛtvābhimantrya saktumadhye dadāti bhakṣārtham |
GV06keskaupu:4034: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīparṇacūrṇaṃ śamīphale kṛtvābhimantryālaṅkāre dadāti vyādhitasya |
GV06keskaupu:4037: 'tvayā pūrvam' iti sūktena śamīcūrṇaṃ kṛtvābhimantrya śālāṃ cūrṇaiḥ parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:4042: 'utāmṛtāsuḥ' ityṛcā bhojanakāle bhaktamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārtham prajñāpranaṣṭe'jñānagṛhīte'dharmagṛhīte trivarge ca vinaṣṭe dyūtakrīḍādyatipratte kubuddhibhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4047: iti caturṛcena kuṣṭhapiṣṭaṃ navanītamiśraṃ kṛtvābhimantryāpratīhāraṃ vyādhitasya śarīraṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4048: rājayakṣmaṇi śiroroge kuṣṭhāmaye sarvagātravedanāsu bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:4051: 'rātrī mātā' (5.5) iti sūktena dugdhe lākṣāṃ kvāthayitvābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4060: pūrvaṃ strī praveśya tūṣṇīṃ tataḥ paścāt kartā tūṣṇīṃ praviśya sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya dadyāt ||
GV06keskaupu:4062: 'brahma jajñānam' 'anāptā ye' 'sahasradhāra eva te' iti sūktena saktumanthamabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4068: yāni carakādivaidyakeṣvadbhutāni paṭhyante'svasthaśārīraviṣaye teṣāṃ sarveṣāmiyaṃ śāntirbhaiṣajyaṃ bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:4069: yāni cādbhutāni śarīraroge jyotiṣe paṭhyante teṣāmapīdaṃ karma ||
GV06keskaupu:4071: [dive svāhā (5.9) imaṃ yavam (6.91) iti catura udapātre sampātānānayati || KauśS_4,4{28}.17 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4072: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'dive svāhā' iti sūktena catura udapātre sampātānānayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4075: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā tataḥ sampātitāṃ bhūmimṛttikāṃ saṅgṛhya tata udapātre prakṣipya tato'bhimantraṇaṃ kṛtvā vyādhitamāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4081: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktenārdharcenārdharcena homaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:4088: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dive svāhā' iti sūktena ṣaṭ sampātān karoti yavasahita udapātre caturaḥ sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:4089: dvau sampātau bhūmau dattvā mṛttikāmudapātre prakṣipya tato'bhimantraṇamāplāvanaṃ ca |
GV06keskaupu:4094: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktenārdharcena ṣaḍ homān kṛtvā catura udapātre sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:4101: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'imaṃ yavam' iti sūktena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4105: sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyaṃ yatra ekasmin vyādhau bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni sarvasmin śāstre tatra sarvatra karmaṇāṃ vikalpaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:4114: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā kṛmukavṛkṣaśakalaṃ saṅghṛṣya tata udakaṃ ca prakṣipya tato'bhimantryāvasiñcati viṣadhāritam |
GV06keskaupu:4119: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dadirhi' ityṛcodapātraṃ sampātya tataḥ pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4120: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā saktumanthamūrdhvaphalābhyāṃ viṣaliptābhyāṃ mathitvābhimantrya pāyayati sarpadaṣṭam |
GV06keskaupu:4124: 'dadirhi' ityṛcā haridrāṃ ghṛtaṃ ca sahābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4130: viṣaṃ stambhitaṃ nānyenottārayituṃ śakyate vana vedamantreṇa ||
GV06keskaupu:4134: 'yatte apodakam' ityṛcaṃ japitvā śvetavastreṇa granthiṃ badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4136: 'yatte apodakam' ityekāṃ japitvā śaṇastambe granthiṃ badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4142: 'vṛṣā me ravaḥ' (5.13.3) ityṛcā yasmin sthāne daṣṭaṃ taṃ sthānaṃ pīḍayati ṛcaṃ japitvā |
GV06keskaupu:4145: [caturthyā dakṣiṇam apehi (7.88.1) iti daṃśma tṛṇaiḥ prakarṣyāhimabhinirasyati ||
GV06keskaupu:4148: 'apehyarirasi' ityṛcaṃ japitvā tṛṇāni prajvālya tato'herabhimukhaṃ kṣipati ||
GV06keskaupu:4150: 'apehyarirasi' ityṛcaṃ japitvā yato daṣṭastato jvalitatṛṇāni kṣipati daśane ||
GV06keskaupu:4152: 'kairāta pṛśne' (5.13.5) ityṛcodakaṃ gṛhatṛṇāvajvālitamabhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati prokṣati ca ||
GV06keskaupu:4158: iti dvābhyāṃ madhumakṣikāṃ madhuvṛkṣamṛttikāṃ cābhimantrya pāyayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4165: 'tābuvaṃ na tābuvam' (5.13.10) ityṛcālābumadhya udakaṃ prakṣipya tato'bhimantryācāmayati |
GV06keskaupu:4170: sarvatra karmaṇāṃ prayogo vikalpena na samuccayaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:4171: ekaṃ kuryād dve vā trīṇi vā sarvāṇi vā |
GV06keskaupu:4173: ekavyādhau yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ vā kuryāt karmabāhulyād dve vā sarvāṇi vā |
GV06keskaupu:4179: iti sūktābhyāṃ kulapallavān madhūdakaṃ caitat tritayamekatra kṛtvābhimantrya tato vyādhita pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4194: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnistakmānam' iti sūktena tāmrasruveṇa mūrdhni sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:4201: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ote me' iti sūktena karīramūlaṃ sampātyabhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4202: 'ote me' iti sūktena govālaiḥ karīrakāṣṭhaṃ veṣṭayitvā |
GV06keskaupu:4208: 'ote me' iti sūktena grāmapāṃsūnabhimantrya savyena hastena dakṣiṇābhimukho bhūtvā pāṃsūn parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:4210: 'ote me' iti sūktena pāṃsūnabhimantrya mathitvā hastena kṛmerupari kṣipati |
GV06keskaupu:4214: [paścādagnermāturupasthe musalabudhnena navanītānvaktena triḥ pratīhāraṃ tāluni tāpayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4216: 'ote me' iti sūktena paścādagnermāturutsaṅge bālakaṃ kṛtvā navanītānvaktena musalabudhnena tāluni tāpayati |
GV06keskaupu:4221: 'ote me' iti sūktena śigrubījairnavanītamiśritairabhimantrya vyādhideśaṃ pralimpati kṣatadeśam | kṛmibhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4223: 'ote me' iti sūktenaikaviṃśatyuśīramūlānyabhimantrya tataḥ pāṣāṇena kuṭṭayati |
GV06keskaupu:4226: 'ote me' iti sūktenaikaviṃśatyuśīrāṇyabhimantrya vyādhitāya samarpayati | kṛmibhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4232: [ā yaṃ viśanti (6.2.2) iti vayoniveśanaśṛtaṃ kṣīraudanamaśnāti || KauśS_4,5{29}.27 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4233: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā yaṃ viśanti' ityṛcā vayoniveśanakāṣṭhaśṛtaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantryāśnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4238: 'pari dyāmiva' iti tṛcena sūktena madhuśībhamabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4248: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4250: 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktenordhvaphalābhyāṃ viṣadigdhābhyāṃ manthamupamathya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4251: 'pari dyāmiva' iti sūktena madanaphalānyabhimantrya bhakṣayati chardanārtham |
GV06keskaupu:4257: apsviṭaṃ kṛtvā tatrāgniṃ prajvālya 'asthisraṃsam' iti sūktena kāṣṭhaśakalaṃ sampātya tena śakalena vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4265: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo anābayo' iti sūktena caturṛcena sarṣapakāṇḍamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4271: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo anābayoḥ' iti sūktena sarṣapakāṇḍamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4277: 'ābayo' iti sūktena sarṣapaśākaṃ sarṣapatailenābhyaktamabhimantrya vyādhitāya prayacchati | akṣiroge ||
GV06keskaupu:4279: 'ābayo' iti sūktena catvāri śākavṛkṣaphalānyabhimantrya prayacchati vyādhitāya | akṣiroge ||
GV06keskaupu:4281: 'ābayo' iti sūktena mūlakṣīraṃ mukhena prāśya tato'bhimantryākṣiṇī āṅkte vyādhitasya |
GV06keskaupu:4284: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ābayo' iti sūktena mūlakṣīraṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati |
GV06keskaupu:4289: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'agnerivāsya dahata eti śuṣmiṇaḥ' iti tṛcena tāmrasruveṇa mūrdhni sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:4300: uṣākāle 'imā yāstisraḥ' iti sūktena bibhītakāni kvāthayitvābhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati | keśabhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4302: uṣākāle 'imā yāstisraḥ' iti dāruharidrāharidre ca dvābhyāṃ kvāthayitvābhimantryāvasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4303: samāptaṃ keśavardhanārthaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ keśapatane ca kṣaye ca ||
GV06keskaupu:4307: iti sūktābhyāṃ cittyādyauṣadhyā sahitamudakamabhimantrya tato vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4310: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ maruto yajate pākayajñavidhānena yathā varuṇam |
GV06keskaupu:4311: 'mārutaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mārutaśṛtaṃ mārutaiḥ paristīya mārutena sruveṇa mārutenājyena varuṇāya trijuhoti' (KauśS 40.7) |
GV06keskaupu:4317: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ cittyādyoṣadhīḥ sampātya viplāvayetodakamadhye |
GV06keskaupu:4321: 'kṛṣṇaṃ niyānam' 'sasruṣīḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ keśajaradupānahau vaṃśāgre baddhvābhimantrya yodhayati |
GV06keskaupu:4325: atha hṛdayadāghe jalodare kāmale ca bhaiṣajyānyucyante -
GV06keskaupu:4327: 'himavataḥ' iti sūktena nadyudakamanulomamāhārya tatra valīkatṛṇāni prakṣipya tato'bhimantrya tato vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4329: hṛdayadoṣe jalodare kāmale ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:4331: [pañca ca yāḥ (6.25) iti pañcapañcāśataṃ paraśuparṇāna kāṣṭhairādīpayati || KauśS_4,6{30}.14 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4332: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena gopāṃśulikānāṃ pañcāśatpañcādhikā agnau prajvālyādhastādayaḥ samidha ādadhāti ||
GV06keskaupu:4335: tataḥ sūktaṃ japitvā tenaiva kāṣṭhena gaṇḍamālāṃ limpati ||
GV06keskaupu:4337: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvā tato'bhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4338: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena śvānakuvakuralālāmabhimantrya pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4339: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena jalaukāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati |
GV06keskaupu:4341: 'pañca ca yāḥ' iti sūktena gṛhagodhikādi matsyādi abhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4342: [niśi ava mā pāpman (6.26) iti titauni pūlyānyavasicyāpavidhya || KauśS_4,6{30}.17 ||
GV06keskaupu:4347: [yaste madaḥ (6.30.2) iti śamīlūnapāpalakṣaṇayoḥ śamīśamyākenābhyudya vāpayati || KauśS_4,7{31}.1 ||
GV06keskaupu:4350: iti samantamagnaḥ karṣvāmuṣṇapūrṇāyāṃ japaṃstriḥ parikramya puroḍāśaṃ juhoti || KauśS_4,7{31}.3 ||
GV06keskaupu:4354: 'prāgnaye vācam' iti sūktenodaudanaṃ juhoti 'prāgnaye' iti sūktena pāyasaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:4386: 'vaiśvānaro na' 'ṛtāvānam' iti sūktābhyāṃ haridrāṃ sarpiṣyabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4388: ājya tantre'pi yat pīyate, tat saṃśṛtya pāyayati vaiśvānarīyābhyāṃ sūktābhyām |
GV06keskaupu:4391: [asthād dyauḥ (6.44) ityapavātāyāḥ svayaṃsrastena gośṛṅgeṇa sampātavatā japan ||
GV06keskaupu:4394: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena pūrveṇa svayampatitaṃ gośṛṅgaṃ sampātya tataḥ śṛṅga udakaṃ kṛtvābhimantryācāmayatyabhyukṣati ca |
GV06keskaupu:4398: athodare vā hṛdaye vāṅge vā sarvāṅge vā śūla utpanne bhaiṣajyamucyate -
GV06keskaupu:4399: [yāṃ te rudraḥ (6.90) iti śūline śūlam || KauśS_4,7{31}.7 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4400: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yāṃ te rudraḥ' iti sūktena śūlamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4415: 'dyauśca me idaṃ pṛthivī' iti tṛcena sūktena tailamabhimantrya gaṇḍamabhyajya hastena vyādhitamavamārṣṭi |
GV06keskaupu:4418: 'dyauśca me' iti sūktaṃ japan vyādhideśaṃ hastena mārṣṭi |
GV06keskaupu:4421: 'dyauśca me' iti sūktena sthūṇāyāṃ vraṇaṃ nikarṣati |
GV06keskaupu:4426: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena gomūtramabhimantrya | tena vraṇaṃ mardayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4428: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena mūtreṇa vraṇaṃ kṣipati ||
GV06keskaupu:4430: tenaiva sūktena mūtreṇa vraṇaṃ prakṣālayati | yasya vraṇasya mukhaṃ nāstyakṣatavraṇamucyate ||
GV06keskaupu:4432: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena dantamalamabhimantrya pralimpati | akṣatavraṇabhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4434: 'idamidvā u bheṣajam' iti sūktena tṛṇarajasya phenamabhimantrya vraṇa pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4435: yasya vraṇasya rudhiraṃ na vahati tasya |
GV06keskaupu:4439: 'apacitaḥ pra patata' iti sūktena śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvābhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4446: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ śaṅkhaṃ ghṛṣṭvābhimantrya tato gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4447: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ śvānalālāṃ kurkaralālāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4449: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ jalaukāmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati rudhirapravāhaṇārtham |
GV06keskaupu:4450: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ gṛhagodhikāṃ maśakādīmabhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ saṃsarjayati rudhirapravāhaṇārtham ||
GV06keskaupu:4452: 'apacitaḥ' iti sūktena saindhavalavaṇaṃ cūrṇayitvābhimantrya gaṇḍamālāyāṃ upari prakirati |
GV06keskaupu:4455: 'ā susrasaḥ' iti dvābhyāṃ saindhavalavaṇaṃ cūrṇayitvābhimantrya vyādhyupari prakirati |
GV06keskaupu:4460: 'antarikṣeṇa patati' iti sūktena śvānapadasthānamṛttikāmabhimantrya pakṣahataṃ deśaṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4463: 'antarikṣeṇa patati' iti sūktena śuno makṣikāmabhimantryāgnau prakṣipya tato dhūpayati vyādhipradeśam |
GV06keskaupu:4467: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena gomūtramabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ mardayati gaṇḍabhaiṣajyam |
GV06keskaupu:4468: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena gomūtramabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ prakṣālayati |
GV06keskaupu:4469: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena dantamalamabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4470: 'glauritaḥ pra patiṣyati' ityardharcena tṛṇarajaphenamabhimantrya gaṇḍaṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:4474: [vīhi svām (6.83.4) ityajñātāruḥ śāntyudakena samprokṣya manasā sampātavatā ||
GV06keskaupu:4476: 'vīhi svāmāhutiṃ juṣāṇaḥ' iti sūktena śāntyudakamabhimantrya tataḥ kṣataṃ prokṣati |
GV06keskaupu:4477: tata ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'vīhi svāmāhutim' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:4484: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīḥ' iti sūktena tṛcena somalatā agnau prakṣipya vyādhitaṃ dhūpayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4486: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ' iti tṛcena madhu takraṃ cābhimantrya pāyayati | jalodare pāpe śāpe ca bhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4488: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīḥ' iti tṛcena kṣīraṃ takreṇa miśrayitvābhimantrya pāyayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4490: 'yā oṣadhayaḥ' iti sūktena madhu takraṃ kṣīraṃ dadhyetaccatuṣṭayamekatra kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4491: brāhmaṇākrośe pāpagṛhīte jalodare ca bhaiṣajyaṃ samāptam ||
GV06keskaupu:4492: viṣa upaviṣe sthāvare jaṅgame ca bhaiṣajyamucyate | makṣikāyāṃ ca bhaiṣajyam -
GV06keskaupu:4494: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkapoṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4496: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛttikāmudakamadhye prakṣipya tato'bhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4497: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛdamudake prakṣipya tato'bhimantryācāmayati |
GV06keskaupu:4499: 'devā aduḥ' iti tṛcena valmīkamṛttikāmuṣṇodake prakṣipya tato'bhimantrya pralimpati viṣadaṣṭavraṇam |
GV06keskaupu:4504: 'yathā mano manasketaiḥ' iti sūktena bhojanamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prathamaṃ prapādya |
GV06keskaupu:4512: 'ava divastārayanti' ityṛcā prapādya gṛhe praveśya tato bhojanamabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārtham |
GV06keskaupu:4514: 'ava divastārayanti' ityṛcā saktumabhimantrya dadāti bhakṣaṇārthamupasthānaṃ ca |
GV06keskaupu:4522: iti mantroktāphalaṃ jīvyalākābhyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ kṛṣṇavasanaḥ kṛṣṇabhakṣaḥ purā kākasampātādavanakṣatre'vasiñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:4524: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kācamācīphalamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4526: 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ jīvantīphalamaṇiṃ badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4528: 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnātyājyatantre |
GV06keskaupu:4531_0: kṛṣṇavastraparihito bhūtvā māṣatilakṛṣṇamannaṃ bhaikṣayitvā kartā 'devī devyām' 'yāṃ
GV06keskaupu:4531_1: jamadagniḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ kācamācīphalabhṛṅgarājābhyāṃ sahodakamabhimantrya rātrau
GV06keskaupu:4533: samāptaṃ keśavṛddhikaraṇaṃ keśajananaṃ khalatikeśajananaṃ keśadṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ palitanāśanaṃ bhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4537: [yaste stanaḥ (7.10) iti jambhagṛhītāya stanaṃ prayacchati || KauśS_4,8{32}.1 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4538: 'yaste stanaḥ' ityṛcā stanamabhimantrya bālakāya prayacchati pānārtham patiḥ karoti kartā vā karoti |
GV06keskaupu:4554: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'agnāviṣṇū' iti dvābhyāṃ mauñjeḥ pāśairvyādhitaṃ baddhvā śarapiñjūlībhiḥ sahodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4558: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'somārudrā vi vṛhatam' iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya tato mauñjeḥ parvasu vyādhita baddhvā darbhapiñjūlībhiḥ sahodakaghaṭenāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4561: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sinīvāli' iti navabhirṛgbhirudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4563: 'vi te muñcāmi raśanām' iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4566: iti dvābhyāmudakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjeḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu baddhvā piñjūlībhirāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4575: sarvatra mauñjaiḥ pāśairaṅgulītrayaṃ baddhvā tat āplāvanamavasevanaṃ ca sarvatra kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:4576: asminnadhikāre āplāvane'vasecane ca mārjanamācamanaṃ ca sarvatra |
GV06keskaupu:4582: 'tiraścirājeḥ' iti sūktena kṣetramṛttikāṃ jīvakoṣaṇyāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4583: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityaṣṭarcena valmīkamṛttikāṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4590: 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityaṣṭarcena haridrāṃ sarpiṣā saha miśritāṃ kṛtvābhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:4593: yāni pāyanānyuktāni tāni 'tiraścirājeḥ' ityasya sūktasya bhavanti |
GV06keskaupu:4596: [apacitām (7.74) iti vaiṇavena dārbhyūṣeṇa kṛṣṇorṇājyena kālabundaiḥ stukāgrairiti mantroktam ||
GV06keskaupu:4600: etābhistisṛbhirvaṃśadhanuṣā kṛṣṇorṇāmayīṃ jyāṃ kṛtvā citritena śareṇa gaṇḍamālāṃ vidhyati pratyṛcam |
GV06keskaupu:4604: iti caturthyā ṛcā caturthena śareṇa gaṇḍamālāmabhinidhāya vidhyatyāhanti |
GV06keskaupu:4608: 'apacitām' iti dve 'ā susrasaḥ' iti tṛtīyā 'yā graivyāḥ' iti caturthī etābhiścatasṛbhiḥ śarakṛṣṇorṇājyāvajvālitamudakamabhimantryoṣākāle rātriśeṣe tenodakenāvasiñcati vyādhitam |
GV06keskaupu:4619: pūrvatantraṃ kṛtvā 'yaḥ kīkasāḥ' iti tṛcena vādyavīṇā tasyāḥ khaṇḍaṃ viṣṇīvādyavīṇākaṇṭhaṃ śaṅkhakhaṇḍaṃ vīṇātantrīṃ baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4623: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yaḥ kīkasāḥ' iti tṛcena svayampatitamlānavīriṇakhaṇḍatrayamekatra baddhvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4626: sarvatra yatra bahūni karmāṇi vihitāni tatraikaṃ kuryāt dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:4632: [apsu te (7.83) iti vahantyormadhye vimite piñjūlībhirāplāvayati || KauśS_4,8{32}.14 ||]
GV06keskaupu:4633: vahantyornadyormadhye maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā tatrājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'apsu te rājan varuṇa' iti caturṛcenoṣṇodakaghaṭaṃ sampātyābhimantrya piñjūlībhiḥ saha vyādhitamāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4638: nadīdvayorvahantyoḥ saṅgame maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā 'apsu te rājan' iti caturṛcenodakamabhimantrya darbhapiñjūlībhiḥ sahodakaṃ gṛhītvā vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4642: āplavanamuṣṇodakenāvasecanaṃ śītodakena | dvayorekaṃ karma | samāptaṃ jalodarabhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4645: iti śakunīniveṣīkāñjimaṇḍūkaṃ nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ sakakṣaṃ baddhvā ||
GV06keskaupu:4647: 'namo rūrāya' iti sūktadvayena khaṭvāyāṃ vyādhitaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍūkamiṣīkāñji nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ sakakṣaṃ baddhvā |
GV06keskaupu:4648: tataḥ khaṭvāyāmadho maṇḍūkaṃ kṛtvā khaṭvāyāṃ vyādhitamupaveśya tata udakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4649: vyādhite sicyamāne yathā maṇḍūko'vasicyate tathā kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:4657_0: śiroroge karṇaroge'ṅgaroge śūle lohitamūtre lohitapurīṣe yakṣmaṇi mukharoge'kṣiroge'ṅgabhede'ṅgajvare
GV06keskaupu:4657_1: vyādhisarpaṇa uroroge śarīrābhyantararoge hṛdayaroge kāse śleṣmaṇi guhyādibhaiṣajyam |
GV06keskaupu:4663: takṣakāya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktenodakamabhimantrya vyādhitamavasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4678: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktena haridrāṃ ghṛtena sahābhimantrya vyādhitaṃ pāyayati ||
GV06keskaupu:4680: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' ityarthasūktena padvaṃ kīṭakaṃ taliṇīti loke prasiddhā taṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya nastaṃ dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:4685: 'indrasya prathamaḥ' iti sūktena paidvaṃ śvetavastraveṣṭitamabhimantrya yatra sarpabhayaṃ tatra nikhanati | paidvaṃ
GV06keskaupu:4686: hiraṇyavarṇasadṛśaḥ kīṭaścitrito vā sa paidva ityucyate |
GV06keskaupu:4693: ityṛcāntenolmukaṃ pratāpyābhimantrya tato viṣavraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsammukhaṃ kṣipati |
GV06keskaupu:4696: sarpādarśane yato daṣṭastataḥ prakṣipatyulmukam | samāptaṃ sarpaviṣabhaiṣajyam ||
GV06keskaupu:4697: athānūkteṣu kauśikīyeṣu sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyeṣūkteṣvanūkteṣu vā paṭhiteṣu tatra sarvatra bhaiṣajyamucyate |
GV06keskaupu:4716: yāni ca pañcapratīkāni sūktāni tānyābhimantraṇana sarvavyādhibhaiṣajyāni bhavanti |
GV06keskaupu:4735: aṃholiṅgena gaṇena pūtīkān piṣṭvābhimantrya pāyayati sarvavyādhiṣu |
GV06keskaupu:4736: aṃholiṅgena gaṇena pramandaṃ piṣṭvābhimantrya pāyayati sarvavyādhiṣu |
GV06keskaupu:4744: ājyatantramabhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā tena vyādhideśaṃ sammārṣṭi |
GV06keskaupu:4756: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātya tenodakena samprokṣati |
GV06keskaupu:4760: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena saptabhiḥ pratīkairudapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya vyādhitamāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4763: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena sapta kāmpīlapuṭānudakena pūrayitvā sampātyābhimantrya pratyṛcaṃ vyādhitamavasiñcati paścādapavidhyati puṭān |
GV06keskaupu:4765: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena catura udapātre sampātānānayati dvau pṛthivyāmāvapati tau pratyāhṛtyāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4769: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātre yavān prakṣipya sampātyābhimantryāplāvayati pūrvavat |
GV06keskaupu:4770: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātre sayave caturaḥ sampātānānayati dvau pṛthivyāṃ tau pratyāhṛtyāplāvayati |
GV06keskaupu:4772: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā aṃholiṅgena yavamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:4782: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇenodapātraṃ sampātyābhimantrya mauñjaiḥ pāśaiḥ parvasu
GV06keskaupu:4788: aṃholiṅgena mauñjaiḥ parvasu baddhvā darbhamaṇiṃ sahodakamabhimantryāvasiñcati |
GV06keskaupu:4798_1: kāṇḍamaṇiṃ yavapalālamaṇiṃ tilapiñjikāmaṇimākṛtiloṣṭavalmīka- jīvakoṣaṇyā veṣṭitamaṇiṃ badhnātītyādi |
GV06keskaupu:4962: dāne dravyatyāge pratigrahe yājane adhyayane'dhyāpane'yājyayājane rogeṣūtpanneṣu |
GV06keskaupu:5047: atha bhaiṣajyāni paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyaṃholiṅgena sarvavyādhiṣu kartavyāni |
GV06keskaupu:5053: tantraṃ kṛtvāṃholiṅgena gaṇena muñjaśiro rajjvā badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5062: yānīha karmāṇi paṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyaṃholiṅgena kartavyāni |
GV06keskaupu:5063: yāni vaidyakeṣvajīrṇaprabhavāni rogajātāni carakabāhaḍasuśruteṣu paṭhyante teṣu tatpaṭhitāni sarvāṇi vyādhiṣvauṣadhāni |
GV06keskaupu:5073: paraśāstrapaṭhitāni vaidyakapaṭhitāni ca tāni sarvāṇi kartavyāni |
GV06keskaupu:5078: tatraivoktaṃ khananavidhānena bandhanaṃ ca sarvatra 'āśyabandhyāplavanayānabhakṣyāṇi sampātavanti' 'sarvāṇyabhimantryāṇi' (KauśS 7.15-16) iti vacanāt |
GV06keskaupu:5095: iti yāni sūktāni bhaiṣajyāni kānicitpaṭhitāni tāni sarvāṇyupadhāne upasthāne ca viniyojyāni tatra tatra vyādhau rudrabhāṣyamate |
GV06keskaupu:5106: putrakāmāyai striyai mṛtāpatyāyai ca rajonāśe ca śāntirucyate |
GV06keskaupu:5107: 'ye triṣaptāḥ' (1.1) iti sūktena śāntauṣadhiṃ sahodakamabhimantrya strīmavasiñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:5109: tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ kṛtvā prayacchati bhakṣaṇārthaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ bandhanārtham |
GV06keskaupu:5115: atha prasavakāla idaṃ karma kriyate | yathā sukhenaiva prasavo bhavatītyarthaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:5117: [vaṣaṭ te pūṣan (1.11) iti catura udapātre sampātānānīya caturo muñjān mūrdhni vivṛhati prācaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:5119: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktenoṣṇodake caturo'psu sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:5123: caturo muñjajātāniṣīkān garbhiṇyā mūrdhni tatra pṛthak vivṛhati | tata
GV06keskaupu:5124: udapātreṇa sampātitenāplāvayati | mārjanācamane ca | tata uttaratantram ||
GV06keskaupu:5129: chidyamānāsu muñjeṣīkāsu garbhasya maraṇaṃ bhavet | ekaṃ karma ||
GV06keskaupu:5131: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktaṃ japitvā śālāgranthīn vicṛtati mocayati | dvitīyaṃ karma ||
GV06keskaupu:5133: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena yoktramabhimantrya kaṭipradeśe badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5136: kecit 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena tailamabhimantryābhyañjanaṃ kurvanti prasavakāle | caturthī ||
GV06keskaupu:5138: [yadi somasyāsi rājñaḥ somāttvā rājño'dhi krīṇāmi yadi varuṇasyāsi rājño varuṇāttvā rājño'dhi krīṇāmi ityekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ srajaṃ parikirati ||
GV06keskaupu:5140: 'yadi somasyāsi rājñaḥ' iti mantreṇaikaviṃśatyā yavairoṣadhyupari prakirati ||
GV06keskaupu:5142: sadhrīcīḥ savratā bhūtvāsyā avata vīryam iti sannayati ||
GV06keskaupu:5145: [mā te riṣatkhanitā yasmai ca tvā khanāmasi |
GV06keskaupu:5149: tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasyamuṣmai tvā śalyasraṃsanam ityastamite chatreṇa cāntardhāya phālena khanati ||
GV06keskaupu:5151: oṣadhikhananavidhānam | 'mā te riṣatkhanitā' iti mantreṇa lohaphālena khanati ||
GV06keskaupu:5153: 'atra tava rādhyatām' iti mantreṇauṣadhyagraṃ tatraiva dadhāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5156: 'iha mama rādhyatām' iti mantreṇa mūlaṃ gṛhṇāti |
GV06keskaupu:5157: gṛhītvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktenauṣadhīmabhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śirasi nidadhāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5159: darbheṇa veṣṭayitvā rātrāvoṣadhikhananaṃ karoti | chatreṇa vāntardhāya khanati ||
GV06keskaupu:5165: yatra kvacidoṣadhikhananaṃ tatra sarvatrānena vidhānena kartavyam |
GV06keskaupu:5171: ekaṃ vā dve vā sarvāṇi vā kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:5173: oṣadhivat srajamūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' ityabhimantrya śirasi vicṛtati |
GV06keskaupu:5174: oṣadhivad vrīhimūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' ityabhimantrya dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:5175: oṣadhivat kākajaṅghāmūlaṃ khātvā 'vaṣaṭ te' ityabhimantrya śirasyupari dadāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5177: 'vaṣaṭ te' iti sūktena catvāryaudumbaraphalāni haste kṛtvā tata udakaṃ prakṣipya tato nirīkṣate ||
GV06keskaupu:5179: yadi tānyekatra bhavati tadā putro jāyate | vijñānakarmedam ||
GV06keskaupu:5181: 'vaṣaṭ te pūṣan' iti sūktena brāhmaṇamabhimantrya tataḥ sa garbhiṇyā aṅgānyabhimṛśati ||
GV06keskaupu:5183: yadi punnāmadheyaṃ spṛśati tadā kumāro jāyate |
GV06keskaupu:5186: ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ kṛtaiḥ garbhiṇyāḥ sukhena prasavo bhavatītyarthaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:5192: 'idaṃ janāsaḥ' iti sūktena śiṃśapāśākhāsūpaviṣṭāyai śāntyauṣadhisahitamudakamabhimantrya vandhyāmavasiñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:5194: tato gṛhe'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idaṃ janāsaḥ' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:5199: ityavatokāyai kṛṣṇavasanāyai triṣu vimiteṣu prāgdvārapratyagdvāreṣvapsu sampātānānayati ||
GV06keskaupu:5201: garbhāstrāve jātamātre mṛte vā stryāṃ vā puruṣe vā bāle vā yūni vā mṛte idaṃ karma |
GV06keskaupu:5202: trīṇi maṇḍapāni prāgdvārāṇi kṛtvaikasmin maṇḍape'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena tataḥ strī kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ paridhāya ||
GV06keskaupu:5204: tata udapātre sampātyābhimantrya palāśapatre sīsaṃ kṛtvā sīseṣūttarasampātānānayati ||
GV06keskaupu:5213: tata dvitīyamaṇḍapa evaṃ kṛtvā śvetavastraṃ paridhānaṃ kṛtvā śiṃśapāśākhāsūpaveśya strīṃ 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena śāntauṣadhibhistadudakamabhimantryāvasiñcati snapanaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5214: tato gṛha āgatyājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:5219: ekaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā prākpaścimadvāre iṣīkāṃ dvāryopari baddhvā tato 'niḥsālām' iti sūktenaudumbarīḥ samidho mṛtāpatyāyai ādadhāti |
GV06keskaupu:5224: tato gṛhe'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'niḥsālām' iti sūktena puroḍāśapramandālaṅkārān sampātavataḥ prayacchati |
GV06keskaupu:5227: garbhapatite bālamaraṇe yuvāne vā mṛte ekasmin vā mṛte bahuṣu vā mṛteṣu strīṇāṃ śāntiḥ kartavyā ||
GV06keskaupu:5231: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktenāgamakṛśaraṃ sampātyābhimantryāśayati kumārīm |
GV06keskaupu:5236: 'ā no agne' iti sūktena hiraṇyālaṅkārān guggulamaukṣaṃ ca yathoktān sampātya bandhanaṃ dhūpanaṃ pralepanaṃ karoti kumāryāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5242: [udakaṃse vrīhiyavau jāmyai niśi hutvā dakṣiṇena prakrāmati || KauśS_4,10{34}.15 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5243: 'ā no agne' iti sūktena kāṃsyapātre udakasahite vrīhiyavau gṛhītvā pratyṛcaṃ juhoti rātrau |
GV06keskaupu:5244: tato dakṣiṇāmukhīṃ kumārīṃ prakrāmati | tantraṃ vā ||
GV06keskaupu:5245: [paścādagneḥ prakṣālya sandhāvya sampātavatīṃ bhagasya nāvam (2.36.5) iti mantroktam ||
GV06keskaupu:5247: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktena nāvaṃ sampātyodake kṛtvā kumārīṃ caṭāpayitvā 'bhagasya nāvam' ityṛcā
GV06keskaupu:5249: [saptadāmnyāṃ sampātavatyāṃ vatsān pratyantān pracṛtanto vahanti || KauśS_4,10{34}.17 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5250: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktena saptadāmatantryāṃ sampātavatyāṃ vatsān bandhayitvābhimantrya kumārī mocayati svayaṃ na kartā |
GV06keskaupu:5256: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ā no agne' iti sūktenāhatavastreṇa veṣṭitaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sampātyābhimantrya visarjayati | uttaratantram ||
GV06keskaupu:5261: [ayamā yāti (6.60) iti purā kākasampātādaryamṇe juhoti || KauśS_4,10{34}.22 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5262: 'ayamā yāti' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhoti | ājyatantre | purā kākasampātāt ||
GV06keskaupu:5264: tataḥ 'aryamṇe' ityardharcena gṛhābhyantare koṇe baliharaṇaṃ karoti | rātrāvidaṃ karma ||
GV06keskaupu:5266: yataḥ kāka āgacchati tata āgacchati varaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5274: [yena vehat (3.23) iti bāṇaṃ mūrdhni vivṛhati badhnāti || KauśS_4,11{35}.3 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5275: 'yena vehat' iti sūktena bāṇamabhimantrya strīmūrdhni vivṛhati puṇyāhānte |
GV06keskaupu:5280: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yena vehat' iti sūktena śaramaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti puṇyāhānte |
GV06keskaupu:5282: [phālacamase sarūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrchayitvādhyaṇḍe bṛhatīpalāśavidaryau vā pratinīya paidvamiva ||
GV06keskaupu:5284_0: 'yena vehat' iti sūktena phālacamase sārūpavatsāyā dugdhe vrīhiyavāvavadhāya mūrcchayitvādhyaṇḍe
GV06keskaupu:5284_1: bṛhatīpalāśavidaryau vā ekatra piṣṭvābhimantrya dakṣiṇenāṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇasyāṃ nāsikāyāṃ nastaṃ dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:5290: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'parvatāddivaḥ' iti sūktenāgamakṛśaraṃ carudvayaṃ śrapayitvaikaṃ caruṃ sampātyābhimantrya dvitīyaṃ caruṃ yugachidreṇa sampātyābhimantrya tataḥ prāśanam |
GV06keskaupu:5292: [khe lūnāṃśca palāśatsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣyādhāya śiśne grāmaṃ praviśati || KauśS_4,11{35}.7 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5293: kelūnāṃśca palāśatsarūn nivṛtte nighṛṣya 'parvatāddivaḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya śiśne ādhāya |
GV06keskaupu:5297: [śamīmaśvatthaḥ (6.11) iti mantrokte'gniṃ mathitvā puṃsyāḥ sarpiṣi paidvamiva ||
GV06keskaupu:5299: 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktenāgniṃ mathitvā tato'gniṃ sarpiṣi nikṣipya ghṛtamabhimantrya stryā dakṣiṇanāsikāyāṃ nastaṃ dadāti dakṣiṇenāṅguṣṭhena ||
GV06keskaupu:5301: tato'gniṃ mathitvā tato madhumanthe'gniṃ nikṣipya 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya pāyayati strīm ||
GV06keskaupu:5303: 'śamīmaśvatthaḥ' iti sūktena śamīgarbhāśvatthasyāgniṃ kṛṣṇorṇayā veṣṭayitvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5308: 'yantāsi' iti sūktena hastāvartaṃ kaṅkaṇādikaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5312: [ṛdhaṅmantraḥ (5.1.1) ityekā yatheyaṃ pṛthivī (6.17) acyutā iti garbhadṛṃhaṇāni ||
GV06keskaupu:5314: jambhagṛhītāya prathamāvarjaṃ jyāṃ trirudgrathya badhnāti || KauśS_4,11{35}.13 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5319: dvābhyāṃ dhanurjyāṃ trirudgrathya sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti striyāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5323: 'yatheyaṃ pṛthivī' 'acyutā' iti sūktābhyāṃ kṣetraloṣṭamṛttikāmabhimantrya prāśayati garbhiṇīṃ pratyṛcam ||
GV06keskaupu:5325: 'ṛdhaṅmantraḥ' ityekayā kṛṣṇasikatā abhimantrya garbhiṇyāḥ śayanaṃ parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:5326: 'yatheyaṃ pṛthivī' 'acyutā' iti sūktābhyāṃ śyāmasikatā abhimantrya pratyṛcaṃ garbhiṇyāḥ śayanaṃ parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:5336: 'prajāpatirjanayatu' iti sūktena prajākāmāyāḥ striya utsaṅge ājyaṃ juhoti | prajananakarma ||
GV06keskaupu:5341: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'prajāpatiḥ' ityṛcodakulijaṃ sampātavantaṃ kṛtvā garbhiṇīṃ parihṛtya madhye ninayati |
GV06keskaupu:5344: bhaktaṃ surāṃ prapāṃ sampātyābhimantrya prajākāmāyai prayacchati tantre | samāptaṃ
GV06keskaupu:5347: [yau te mātā (8.6) iti mantroktau badhnāti || KauśS_4,11{35}.20 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5348: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yau te mātā' ityarthasūktena śvetapītasarṣapān sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5359_0: vṛkṣatvak śarakhaṇḍaṃ tagaramañjanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhīmadhu śleṣmavātasaṃśrayagatatṛṇametāni
GV06keskaupu:5359_1: dravyāṇyājyamadhye peṣayitvā 'yathedaṃ bhūmyāḥ' iti sūktenābhimantrya striyā aṅgaṃ samālabhate |
GV06keskaupu:5361: 'yathā vṛkṣaṃ libujā' 'vāñcha me tanvam' iti sūktābhyāṃ vṛkṣatvak tagaramañjanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhīmadhu vātasambhramatṛṇānyetāni dravyāṇyājyenāloḍyābhimantrya jāyāṃ pralimpati |
GV06keskaupu:5362: 'yathāyaṃ vāhaḥ' ityetāni dravyāṇyāloḍya ghṛtena tato'bhimantrya jāyāṃ pralimpati | vaśīkaraṇakāmaḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:5364: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktaṃ japitvā aṅgulyā nudati bhāryām udare pṛṣṭau rucyarthī ||
GV06keskaupu:5368: ekaviṃśatibadarīprāntāni sūtreṇa veṣṭayitvā 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena sakṛt juhoti | rucyarthī ||
GV06keskaupu:5370: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena kuṣṭhaṃ navanītenābhyajyāgnau prakṣipati prātarmadhyandine sāyaṃ ca | ekarātrau vā ||
GV06keskaupu:5372: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena khaṭvādhomukhapaṭṭikāṃ gṛhītvā saṃviśati svapiti | trirātraṃ karma ||
GV06keskaupu:5374: 'uttudastvā' iti sūktenoṣṇodakaṃ tripāde śikye prabaddhāṅguṣṭhābhyāmardayañchete | rucyarthī ||
GV06keskaupu:5377: pratikṛtimāvalekhanīṃ dārbhyaṣeṇa bhāṅgajyena kaṇṭakaśalyayolūkapatrayāsitālakāṇḍayā 'uttudastvā' iti sūktena hṛdaye vidhyati |
GV06keskaupu:5380: tathā ca yasya kāmo nāsti tasya kāmo'tiśayena kāmakaraṇamityarthaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5386: udapātreṇa sampātavatā śālāṃ samprokṣyāparasmin dvārapakṣe nyubjati || KauśS_4,12{36}.2 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5387: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'sahasraśṛṅgaḥ' iti sūktenodapātraṃ sampātya śālāṃ samprokṣati |
GV06keskaupu:5394: 'sahasraśṛṅgaḥ' iti sūktena striyāḥ khaṭavāyā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamabhimantrayate |
GV06keskaupu:5401: svāpanaṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ nidrākāmānāṃ nidrā bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:5405: atha palāyinyāḥ striyo bandhanakarma tantrakrameṇa kriyate |
GV06keskaupu:5411: 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena dvitīyena rajjuveṣṭanamabhimantrya vaṃśāgre baddhvā madhyamasthūṇe badhnāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5415: 'asthād dyauḥ' iti sūktena śayanapādamabhimantryotpale ca badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5420: 'idaṃ yatpreṇyaḥ śiraḥ' iti sūktena strīśiraḥkarṇaṃ cānumantrayate | puruṣasya ca ||
GV06keskaupu:5422: 'idaṃ yatpreṇyaḥ śiraḥ' iti sūktena keśān dhārayati | samāptaṃ strīpuruṣayorakrodhakaraṇam ||
GV06keskaupu:5429: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhagena mā śāṃśapena' iti sūktena śaṅkhapuṣpīmūlamoṣadhivat khātvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5431: 'bhagena mā' iti sūktena sauvacalapuṣpamabhimantrya yasya saubhāgyamicchati tasya śirasi baddhvā sa maithunaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5434: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'nyastikā rurohitha' iti sūktena sauvarcalamūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti puṣpaṃ ca śirasi dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:5436: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'idaṃ khanāmi' iti sūktena sauvarcalamūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5446: 'rathajitām' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiścaṇakānabhimantrya striyā ākrameṣu vapati |
GV06keskaupu:5449: 'rathajitām' iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ śarabhṛṣṭīrādīptā abhimantrya pratidiśamabhyasyati |
GV06keskaupu:5450: eṣu patiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā 'rathajitām' iti tribhisūktaiḥ hṛdaye vidhyati dārbhyūṣeṇa bhāṅgajyena |
GV06keskaupu:5454: atha striyo vā puruṣasya vā daurbhāgyakaraṇamucyate -
GV06keskaupu:5456: iti mālāniṣpramandadantadhāvanakeśamīśānahatāyā anustaraṇyā vā kośamulūkhaladaraṇe triśile nikhanati ||
GV06keskaupu:5469: 'bhagamasyā varcaḥ' iti sūktena strīpuṣpamālāṃ hastena mathitvā strīṃ dṛṣṭvānvāha |
GV06keskaupu:5471: [trīṇi keśamaṇḍalāni kṛṣṇasūtreṇa vigrathya triśile'śmottarāṇi vyatyāsam || KauśS_4,12{36}.17 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5472: 'bhagamasyā varcaḥ' iti sūktena trīṇi keśamaṇḍalāni kṛṣṇasūtreṇa veṣṭayitvābhimantrya triśile'śmottarāṇi vyatyāsamaśmānaṃ śālāyā upari dadāti |
GV06keskaupu:5477: [athāsyai bhagamutkhanati yaṃ te bhagaṃ nicakhnustriśile yaṃ catuḥśile |
GV06keskaupu:5478: idaṃ tamutkhanāmi prajayā ca dhanena ca iti ||
GV06keskaupu:5480: 'yaṃ te bhagaṃ nicakhnuḥ' ityṛcā śilā utkhanati |
GV06keskaupu:5483: samāptaṃ yasyā daurbhāgyaṃ kṛtaṃ tasyāḥ saubhāgyakaraṇam ||
GV06keskaupu:5484: atha sapatnījayakarmāṇyucyante | bhartrā saha vidveṣo bhavatītyarthaḥ -
GV06keskaupu:5485: [imāṃ khanāmi (3.18) iti bāṇāparṇīṃ lohitājāyā drapsena sannīya śayanamanu parikirati ||
GV06keskaupu:5487: 'imāṃ khanāmi' iti sūktena bāṇāparṇīṃ raktavarṇāyā ajāyā dadhyudakena sannīya tato'bhimantrya sapatnīśayane parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:5490: 'abhi te'dhām' iti pādena bāṇāparṇīpatrāṇyabhimantrya śayanādhastāt prakṣipati |
GV06keskaupu:5493: 'upa te'dhām' iti pādena bāṇāparṇī-oṣadhipatrāṇyabhimantrya sapatnīśayana upari kṣipati |
GV06keskaupu:5499: 'apa naḥ śośucadagham' (4.33) iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā abhimantrya parikiran vrajati |
GV06keskaupu:5501: sthānaṃ yāvat | strī vā puruṣo vā ||
GV06keskaupu:5503: 'apa naḥ śośucat' iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā haste gṛhītvā parikiran vrajati |
GV06keskaupu:5506: 'apa naḥ śośucat' iti sūktenāsaṅkhyātāḥ śarkarā haste gṛhītvā japati |
GV06keskaupu:5516: 'īrṣyāyā dhrājiṃ prathamām' iti sūktenerṣyāluṃ dṛṣṭvā japati |
GV06keskaupu:5529: 'īrṣyāyā dhrājim' iti sūktena kaṭipradeśe vakṣaṇe khalvāmabhimantrya dhamati | īrṣyāvināśanam ||
GV06keskaupu:5535: 'ava jyāmiva' iti sūktena manyumantaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvāśmānamabhimantrya hastena gṛhṇāti |
GV06keskaupu:5540: 'abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyum' (6.42.3) ityekāṃ japitvāśmanopari niṣṭhīvati ||
GV06keskaupu:5542: 'ava jyāmiva' iti sūktena manyumataḥ puruṣasya chāyāyāṃ dhanurabhimantrya sajyaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5545: manyurbhavati | puruṣaviṣaye strīṇāṃ vā | samāptāni strīviṣaye manyuvināśakāni ||
GV06keskaupu:5548: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'ayaṃ darbhaḥ' iti sūktena darbhamūlamoṣadhivat khātvā sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti manyuke |
GV06keskaupu:5559: 'agne jātān' ityacāśvatarīmūtreṇa pāṣāṇaṃ nighṛṣya tato'bhimantrya bhaktena saha dadāti vidveṣiṇya parastryai |
GV06keskaupu:5560: 'agne jātān' ityṛcāśvatarīmūtramaśmamaṇḍalābhyāṃ saṅghṛṣyābhimantryālaṅkāraṃ samālabhate parastryai vidveṣiṇyai |
GV06keskaupu:5573: 'api vṛśca' iti sūktaṃ tṛcaṃ jāraṃ dṛṣṭvā japati ||
GV06keskaupu:5575: 'api vṛśca' iti sūktena jārapadasthāne bādhakaṃ dhanurvṛścati ||
GV06keskaupu:5577: 'api vṛśca' iti tṛcena sūktena pāṣāṇamabhimantrya jāramaithunasthāne prakṣipatyuccāṭanārtham |
GV06keskaupu:5581: 'tṛṣṭikaḥ' iti dvyarcena sūktena bāṇāparṇīṃ lohitājāyā drapsena sannīyābhimantrya śayanamanu parikirati |
GV06keskaupu:5585: [ā te dade (7.114.1) iti mantroktāni saṃspṛśati || KauśS_4,12{36}.39 ||
GV06keskaupu:5620: ityādi manasā vācā vā sañcitya tatkarma kuryāt ||
GV06keskaupu:5623: 'ambayo yanti' iti sūktena rādhyamānaṃ kṣīraudanamabhimantrya tata āsiñcet |
GV06keskaupu:5626: yadi yathācintitaṃ bhavati yadā tasya kāryasiddhirbhaviṣyati jānīyāt |
GV06keskaupu:5637: 'ambayo yanti' iti sūktena saṅgrāme pūrvedyurvediṃ kṛtvābhimantryāyācet |
GV06keskaupu:5640: bhoge kevalyādi laukikānyupaśrutaye vyāsāṣṭakā vyāsaḥ kaṣṭādayaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5641: anyāni jyotiḥśāstrapaṭhitāni sarvāṇi vijñānāni śāstrāṇyabhimantrya kartavyāni ||
GV06keskaupu:5645: 'venastat' iti sūktena pañcagranthiveṇudaṇḍamabhimantryāyācya same dhārayatyabhīṣṭadiśi patanenārthasiddhiḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5648: 'venastat' iti sūktena kumbha udakapūrṇaṃ dugdhaṃ prakṣipyāyācet |
GV06keskaupu:5668: atha naṣṭadravye parīkṣaṇe kriyamāṇe ca idaṃ karma -
GV06keskaupu:5670: anatīkāśamavacchādyārajovitte kumāryau yena haretāṃ tato naṣṭam || KauśS_5,1{37}.5 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5671: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā kumbhamahatena pariveṣṭyādhāya śayane 'venastat' iti sūktena kumbhe sampātānānayati |
GV06keskaupu:5672: arajovitte kumāryau yena haretāṃ tato naṣṭam |
GV06keskaupu:5675: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'venastat' iti sūktenāhatena vastreṇa veṣṭitaṃ halaṃ sampātyābhimantrya yena haretāṃ tato naṣṭam | tata
GV06keskaupu:5677: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'venastat' iti sūktenākṣān kumbhavat kṛtvā sampātya yena haretāṃ tato naṣṭam |
GV06keskaupu:5713: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena nagno lalāṭamunmṛjānaḥ arkamukho bhūtvopatiṣṭhate ||
GV06keskaupu:5715: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktenābhyantare praviśyāṅgānyudvartya bahirniṣkramyāṅgārakapāle'gniṃ kṛtvā śigruṃ juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:5716: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena kapāle'gniṃ kṛtvā śarkarāṃ juhoti ||
GV06keskaupu:5719: abhyantare praviśya tata udvartya tato homaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5728: 'jarāyujaḥ' iti sūktena khadāṃ khātvā khadāṃ triṣparikramyārkaṃ nirlucitaṃ kṛtvā khadāyāṃ prakṣipati sūktāntena |
GV06keskaupu:5733: [namaste astu (1.13) yaste pṛthu stanayitnuḥ (7.11) ityaśaniyuktamapādāya || KauśS_5,2{38}.8 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5736: 'namaste astu vidyute' iti sūktena khaṅgaṃ gṛhītvopatiṣṭhate |
GV06keskaupu:5740: 'namaste astu' iti sūktena somadarbhakeśānīkuṣṭhalākṣāmañjiṣṭhībadaraharidrametāni dravyāṇi bhūrje kṛtvā manthaśirasi kṛtvābhimantrya kṣetramadhye nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:5743: svacakraṃ paracakraṃ ca saptaitā ītayaḥ smṛtāḥ ||“
GV06keskaupu:5746: avadīryamāṇe grāme vāvasāne vāgniśaraṇe vā samajyāyāṃ vā gṛhe vā prākāre vā yānyavātarakṣārthaṃ karma vakṣyāmaḥ -
GV06keskaupu:5752: ityṛcaṃ varjayitvā catuḥpuroḍāśān sampātya gṛhakoṇeṣu nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:5757: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'āśānāmāśāpālebhyaḥ' iti tṛtīyāvarjena sūktena puroḍāśānaśmanaścobhayān sampātavataḥ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5768: ityanuvākena puroḍāśān sampātyāśmottarān kṛtvā nikhanati grāmasya koṇeṣu |
GV06keskaupu:5770: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākena puroḍāśānaśmanaśca sampātya gṛhakoṇeṣu nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:5774: 'satyaṃ bṛhat' ityanuvākaṃ japati śayāno'gniśaraṇa upaviṣṭaḥ san |
GV06keskaupu:5776: sarvatra karmaṇāṃ vikalpaḥ | gṛhapatane grāmapatane kāryāṇi dṛḍhakaraṇe'vadīraṇarakṣārtham ||
GV06keskaupu:5778: [iyaṃ vīrut (1.34) iti madughaṃ khādannaparājitāt pariṣadamāvrajati || KauśS_5,2{38}.17 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5786: 'necchatruḥ' iti pāṭāmūlamabhimantrya mukhe prakṣipya khādannaparājitād deśādāgacchati ||
GV06keskaupu:5790: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'necchatruḥ' iti sūktena pāṭāmūlaṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti | jayārtham ||
GV06keskaupu:5792: 'necchatruḥ' iti sūktena pāṭāpuṣpamālāmabhimantrya śirasi dhārayati kecijjātyādigandhapuṣpāṇi |
GV06keskaupu:5793: 'necchatruḥ' iti sūktena pāṭāpalāśīṃ saptapalāśīṃ saptaparṇīmālāmabhimantrya dhārayati |
GV06keskaupu:5797: 'ye bhakṣayantaḥ' iti sūktena bhaktamabhimantrya bhaktaṃ śākādi ca tato bhuñjati |
GV06keskaupu:5800: 'brahma jajñānam' iti prathamena kāṇḍādinā sūktena vedaṃ vā anuvākaṃ vā sūktaṃ vā kalpaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā'dhyayanaṃ kartumicchati tadā tadā sūktaṃ japitvā tato'dhyayanaṃ kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:5803: 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktaṃ japati vivāde jayārtham ||
GV06keskaupu:5805: 'brahma jajñānam' iti sūktaṃ japitvā mīmāṃsāvyākaraṇādiśāstravādaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5809: [mamāgne varcaḥ (5.3) iti vibhuṅkṣyamāṇaḥ pramattarajjuṃ badhnāti || KauśS_5,2{38}.26 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5810: 'mamāgne varco vihaveṣu' iti sūktena cākrikasya rajjumabhimantrya dhārayati hastena |
GV06keskaupu:5817: ājyatantraṃ kṛtvā 'sabhā ca mā samitiḥ' iti pañcarcena sūktena kṣīraudanaṃ sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati |
GV06keskaupu:5819: tantraṃ kṛtvā 'sabhā ca mā' iti puroḍāśaṃ sampātyābhimantrya
GV06keskaupu:5822: 'sabhā ca mā' iti pañcarcena rasān sampātyābhimantrya bhakṣayati ājyatantre ||
GV06keskaupu:5824: 'sabhā ca mā' iti pañcarcaṃ sūktaṃ japitvā sthūṇāṃ gṛhṇāti |
GV06keskaupu:5831: yadvadati tat tathaiva vadati yaccakṣuṣā paśyati tadvadan |
GV06keskaupu:5841: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' iti sūktena tilakamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya puṇyāhānte badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5847: strīkṛte śūdrakṛte rājakṛte brāhmaṇakṛte kapālikakṛte śākinīkṛte'ntyajādikṛte'nyeṣāṃ vā duḥsiddhiḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5852: abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' iti sūktena tilakamaṇiṃ sampātyābhimantrya badhnāti |
GV06keskaupu:5859: purastādagneḥ piśaṅgaṃ gāṃ dhārayitvā paścādagnerlohitājaṃ dhārayitvā tataḥ śāntyudakaṃ karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5864: darbhā apāmārgā sahadevī āṭarūṣakaḥ kāmpīlaṃ sitīvārasadampuṣpā etā mantroktāḥ bhājana ānayati śāntigaṇena ||
GV06keskaupu:5884: tato vāstoṣpatyaḥ, mātṛnāmā, cātana, bṛhacchāntigaṇa ete pañca gaṇāḥ śāntyudaka āvāpyante |
GV06keskaupu:5885: tato mātalīṃ kṛtvā 'sarvā imāḥ' ityādi karoti ||
GV06keskaupu:5887: yatāyai yatāyai śāntāyai śāntivāyai bhadrāyai bhadrāvati syonāyai śagmāyai śivāyai sumaṅgali prajāvati susīme'haṃ vāmābhūḥ iti ||
GV06keskaupu:5889: tena śāntyudakena prokṣan vrajati kṛtyānikhananasthānaṃ ca |
GV06keskaupu:5891: upānahau paridhāyoṣṇīṣaṃ kṛtvā'gre bhūtvā kartā śāntyudakena prokṣati |
GV06keskaupu:5893: vālāgamapātreṣu kṛtyādiṣu ca sarveṣvidaṃ karma bhavati ||
GV06keskaupu:5895: kṛtyayāmitracakṣuṣā samīkṣan kṛtavyadhani (5.14.9) ityavaliptaṃ kṛtyayā vidhyati ||
GV06keskaupu:5899: yadi kṛtyā duṣṭā bhavati tadā vakṣyamāṇaṃ karma karoti |
GV06keskaupu:5900: atha na bhavati tadā na kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:5902: kṛtyādiṣu ca sarveṣu idaṃ karma bhavati amitracakṣuṣā iti |
GV06keskaupu:5908: dhanuṣāthavā dārbhyūṣeṇa kāryotpannena vidhyavidhinā kāṇḍena vidhyati ||
GV06keskaupu:5909: [dūṣyā dūṣirasi (2.11) iti darvyā triḥ sārūpavatsenāpodakena mathitena gulphān pariṣiñcati ||
GV06keskaupu:5911: 'dūṣyā dūṣirasi' ityṛcā darvyā triḥ sārūpavatsasya vinodakena manthena gulphān pariṣiñcati | sakṛnmantraḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:5914: [yaṣṭibhiścarma pinahya praiṣakṛt parikramya bandhānmuñcati sandaṃśena || KauśS_5,3{39}.15 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5915: māṃsāni śakale nidhāya kartā lakuṭaiścarmaṇā baddhvā praiṣakṛt parikramya bandhānmuñcati sandaṃśena ||
GV06keskaupu:5921: 'abhyaktāktā svaraṅkṛtā' ityṛcā navanītenābhyajyākṣiṇī cāṅkte | kṛtyāṃ sālaṅkārāṃ badhnāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5926: dakṣiṇenālābūdakapūrṇamādāya tato'raṇye gacchanti saha kartrā sarve ||
GV06keskaupu:5931: dakṣiṇāpravaṇe vā svayandīrṇe vā svakṛte veriṇe'nyāśāyāṃ vā nidadhāti || KauśS_5,3{39}.25 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5932: anāvṛte vā'goṣpadadeśe vā'nudakakhāte vā dakṣiṇāpravaṇe vā svayamavadīrṇe vā svakṛte veriṇe'nyāśāyāṃ vā tatra kṛtyāṃ
GV06keskaupu:5946: abhicāradeśā mantreṣu vijñāyante tāni marmāṇi || KauśS_5,3{39}.31 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5948: daśa gāvo dakṣiṇā vṛṣabhairyuktaṃ halaṃ ca āṅgirasakalpe kṛtāṃ kṛtyāṃ śamayati |
GV06keskaupu:5954: yena kṛto'bhicārastasyaiva gacchati yataḥ pratyabhicāro bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:5960: [yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ (3.13) iti yenecchennadī pratipadyeteti prasiñcan vrajati ||
GV06keskaupu:5962: nadīpravāhaṃ khātvā 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena prasiñcan vrajati |
GV06keskaupu:5967: nadīpravāhaṃ khātvā tasmin pravāha idaṃ karoti ||
GV06keskaupu:5969: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena kāśamabhimantrya tatra khāte ropayati |
GV06keskaupu:5970: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena divi sevālaparṇīmabhimantrya ropayati nadīpravāhe |
GV06keskaupu:5971: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena dhuvaka paṭerakamabhimantrya nadīpravāhe nikhanati |
GV06keskaupu:5975: 'idaṃ va āpaḥ' iti pādena hiraṇyamabhimantrya nadīmārgakhāte nidadhāti ||
GV06keskaupu:5976: [ayaṃ vatsaḥ (3.13.7) itīṣīkāñjimaṇḍūkaṃ nīlalohitābhyāṃ sakakṣaṃ baddhvā || KauśS_5,4{40}.4 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5977: 'ayaṃ vatsaḥ' iti pādeneṣīkāñjimaṇḍūkaṃ nīlalohitābhyāṃ sūtrābhyāṃ baddhvābhimantrya nidadhāti khātapravāhe ||
GV06keskaupu:5986: [mārutaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mārutaśṛtaṃ mārutaiḥ paristīrya mārutena sruveṇa mārutenājyena varuṇāya trirjuhoti ||
GV06keskaupu:5988: varuṇadevatāpākayajñavidhānenājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena trirvibhajya juhoti |
GV06keskaupu:5990: kṛṣṇavrīhiḥ kṛṣṇāyā goḥ payaḥ ghṛtaṃ ca vetasakāṣṭhasruva indhanaṃ ca vetasapatraiḥ staraṇaṃ paṭerakena vā |
GV06keskaupu:5992: udake pravāha udakapravāhabhaye nadībhaye grāme nagare vā yatrodakanadībhayaṃ bhavati tatra sarvatra vāruṇo homaḥ kartavyaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:5995: dadhimanthaṃ baliṃ hṛtvā samprokṣaṇībhyāṃ prasiñcan vrajati || KauśS_5,4{40}.9 ||]
GV06keskaupu:5996: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena dadhisaktumanthaṃ baliharaṇaṃ kṛtvā vaitase camase vaitasābhyāmupamanthanībhyāmupamathya baliṃ haret |
GV06keskaupu:5998: iti dvābhyāṃ samprokṣaṇībhyāṃ mantrodakaṃ nadīpravāhe prasiñcan vrajati |
GV06keskaupu:6000: yadi na vahati nadī tadā vakṣyamāṇamidaṃ karma -
GV06keskaupu:6002: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktena hastena nadīṃ vahanti |
GV06keskaupu:6004: 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' iti sūktaṃ japitvā svayaṃ patati |
GV06keskaupu:6006: yadi dūraṃ gatā punarnivartate tadedaṃ karma |
GV06keskaupu:6007: eka ācāryāḥ 'yadadaḥ samprayatīḥ' ityādi sarvamekaṃ karma manyante |
GV06keskaupu:6009: anye prasiñcanakarma hiraṇyamaṇḍūkakarma yogakarma manthanakarma pāṇikarmaiteṣāṃ vikalpaṃ manyante |
GV06keskaupu:6018: anena vidhānena samāropaṇaṃ kṛtvā pathi gacchatāṃ doṣo na bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:6021: [upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punardevo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan |
GV06keskaupu:6022: ānandino modamānāḥ suvīrā indhīmahi tvā śaradāṃ śatāni ityupāvarohayati ||
GV06keskaupu:6027: ekāgnau vā tretāyāṃ vā śāntikapauṣṭikādau ca sarvatra samāropaṇamupāvarohaṇaṃ bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:6030: [yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat (4.4) vṛṣaṇaste khanitāro vṛṣā tvamasyoṣadhe |
GV06keskaupu:6031: vṛṣāsi vṛṣṇyāvati vṛṣaṇe tvā khanāmasi (PaippS 4.5.2) ityucchuṣmāparivyādhāvāyasena khanati ||
GV06keskaupu:6034_0: kapikacchumūlaṃ oṣadhivat khātvā 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste
GV06keskaupu:6034_1: khanitā' iti mantreṇa dugdhe śrapayitvopaviṣṭaṃ dhanurutsaṅge kṛtvā dugdhe prakṣipya
GV06keskaupu:6034_2: tato dugdhaṃ 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste' ityabhimantrya pāyayati |
GV06keskaupu:6035: 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' 'vṛṣaṇaste' ityṛcā suravālakamoṣadhivat khātvā dugdhe śrapayati |
GV06keskaupu:6036: upaviṣṭaṃ dhanurutsaṅge kṛtvā 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti sūktena 'vṛṣaṇaste khanitāraḥ' iti dugdhamabhimantrya pāyayati ||
GV06keskaupu:6038: 'yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanat' iti 'vṛṣaṇaste khanitāraḥ' ityṛcā kapikacchvoṣadhivat khātvā dugdhe śrapayitvā kīlaka upaviśya 'yāṃ tvā' iti dugdhamabhimantrya pibati |
